ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 37
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone my name   is    VENTURA i am a level 17 shamen and I play on the rallos rek  (PVP)server,well what i was wanting to know is i do have some
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone my name is VENTURA i am a level 17 shamen and I play on
the rallos rek (PVP)server,well what i was wanting to know is i do have
some weapons for sale and some armour for sale

1 RUNED TOTEM STAFF 14pp
1 FINE STEEL STAFF 10pp

again I play the game alot i have 4 characters the othere main 1(player)is
NUNEZ

NECROMANCER

AND IF ANY OF YOU WANT TO HUNT WITH ME BY ALL MEANS GIVE ME A TELL OR IF YOU
JUST WANT TO GO OUT AND PK,,IT IS ALL THE SAME TO ME



LATER,hope to hear from 1 of you

rick(seattle)

VENTURA
NUNEZ

> From: "Remlin" <remlin@...>
>
> Thats True the fuller the group more bonus.. Verant does this to promote
> Group Adventuring!
>
> Plus in a dungeoun you get an additional bonus, so 6 people groups in
> dungeouns rock!
>
> Later
> Chris
> Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
> <Rallos Zek>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim West <twest@...>
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 7:36 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 37
>
>
> >From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
> >
> >
> >
> >I agree with the no PvP. This game is about grouping up together and
having
> >fun. I was grouped up with a Bar Rogue, High Elf Bard, Half Elf Paladin,
> >Dwarf Cleric, and myself in Unrest. What a great place for a lev 15
player
> >to lev up ! I gained 2 bubbles in about 1and a half hours. It was
> >constant battling. I was told that there is a 10% exp. bonus with three
> >people grouped and a 25% exp. bonus for six people grouped. Has anyone
> >else heard about this ?
> >
> >
> >
> >Tanaman
